title: (1) New Class of Thienopyridines: Design, Synthesis, Antimicrobial Activity and Molecular Docking
description: This study aims to synthesis new class of Thienopyridines in addition to investigate its antimicrobial effects on pathogenic bacteria and fungus. Besides the antimicrobial effects, we did the Molecular docking

title: (2) Rational Design of New Thienopyridine Heterocycles Tethering Thiophene Moiety as Antimicrobial Agents: Synthesis and Computational Biology Study
description: The objective of the proposed work is investigation the molecular and antimicrobial effect of the synthesized chemical compounds

title: (3) A review: The role of Gut microbiota and Fusobacterium nucleatum in colorectal cancer (CRC)
description: This review investigates the role of microbiota in CRC

title: (4) Bacteriophage Therapy in Aquaculture: A Promising Solution for Disease Management
description: This review discusses the danger of aquaculture diseases and the usage of bacteriophages on it
